Date 2019/07/24 12:41
Subject: Re: Epstein #76318-054
Attachments: TEXT.htm [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) vcf
Sure, I will talk to RN [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) . If he doesn't have the med, let me ask MD for a new Rx.
Thank You,
[b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 
[b)(6); (b)(7)(C) PharmD, MS, BCACP
CAPT, U.S. Public Health Service

>>> [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 7/24/2019 11:34 AM >>>
Okay, thank you. Perhaps you can advise the Duty PA to ensure the inmate receives the medication while on Psychological Observation? If not, I can do so.
>>> [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 7/24/2019 11:32 AM >>>
Hello,
Hm.. his docusate sodium 100mg (colace) was filled for a 30 day supply on 7/12..?
Thank You,
[b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 
[b)(6); (b)(7)(C) PharmD, MS, BCACP
CAPT, U.S. Public Health Service
Chief Pharmacist
MCC New York
